sub_title: Brand Specialist | Marketing & Channel strategy | Digital Marketing | Customer oriented | Sales driven
summary:
Ever since I was 15 years old, I knew that I was going to work in Marketing. And while I didn’t have everything figured out just yet, my passion for this field turned out to be very serious and has driven me to the Marketing specialist I have become. 

Thanks for stopping by and if my profile caught your attention take a look at what I’ve been doing professionally since then: 

•	Marketing enthusiast with over 15 years’ experience in: FMCG, Real Estate, Transportation and Retail 
industries
•	Brand building and brand repositioning for current brands.
•	Defining marketing strategy based on market research, consumer insights and overall business objectives
•	Translating business needs and objectives into actual marketing executional plans
•	Creating and implementing the marketing plans, from strategy to content creation (both visual content as well as copywriting). 
•	Creating the online and offline channel strategy for each product/ category in the portfolio
•	Managing advertising campaigns on all marketing channels: TV, online, social media, website, BTL and in store 
•	Experienced in TV media planning and optimisation, in alliance to the company’s strategy and budget
•	Real time strategy optimisation based on partial results 
•	Budget management
•	Customer acquisition and retention
•	Email marketing specialist, experienced in: customer data base growth and activation, analysing and developing relevant email marketing offers based on: open rate, click through rate, bounce rate, session duration and revenue. 
•	Analysing and correlating:  Google analytics, Google ads, Meta Business Suite results in order achieve the set KPIs and increase ROAs. 
•	Know-how of market research and intelligence practices and tools, experience with: market and consumer research in the above-mentioned industries.
•	Developing clear documentation, timelines, status updates and other materials for all stakeholders
•	Love to stay updated with the innovations in marketing apps and platforms, such as: Canva and Planoly
•	Excellent project management skills
•	Team-player, able to work in teams as well as individually

I enjoy meeting new people and diving in insightful conversations. Reach out on Linkedin if you want to get together and exchange ideas.

authors.headline: Brand Specialist | Marketing & Channel strategy | Digital Marketing | Customer oriented | Sales driven

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible with building strong relationship with seller partners in the Home, Kitchen and Furniture categories, across EU9 countries. 
•	Analyzing sales data, market trends, and customer insights to develop actionable tailormade recommendations for seller partners.
•	Implementing pricing and promotional strategies that align with brand objectives and marketplace dynamics.
•	Monitoring competitor activities and market trends, while proactively identifying opportunities and potential risks.
•	Collaborating with cross-functional teams to execute strategic initiatives that enhance brand visibility, product discoverability, and overall customer experience.
•	Utilizing Amazon's tools and resources to continuously improve product rankings, search performance, and conversion rates.
•	Working closely with the advertising team to develop and execute effective marketing campaigns that drive traffic and sales.
•	Providing guidance and support to seller partners on best practices for success on the Amazon platform.
profile_positions.title: Brand Specialist- German

company.name: Brico Depot Romania (part of Kingfisher Group)

profile_positions.company: Brico Depot Romania (part of Kingfisher Group)
profile_positions.description:
•	Category owner for: Interiors, Kitchen, Bathroom, Building and B2B categories 
•	Help drive a 20% sales increase for the above-mentioned categories in the period 2021 – 2022.
•	Developing and executing the marketing strategy for all 5 categories from: market and competitor analysis, trends evaluation, discovering potential audience and defining the direct target, underlining the category potential, portfolio development, mapping online and offline channels for each category
•	Experienced in media buying and optimisation for the following channels: TV, Radio, OOH, as well as digital and social media 
•	Evaluating and optimizing campaigns as well as proposing new action tactics based on preliminary results, in order to achieve the targeted KPI’s.  
•	Project manager for in store design projects 
•	Achieved a 150% year-over-year growth for the email marketing channel by: analysing the data customer base, email content and offers and creating a tailor-made marketing strategy that suites best Brico Depot as a DIY retailer.  
•	Monthly assessing the data base evolution, active vs inactive users, open rate vs subject, click through rate vs offer, bounce rate and session duration, as well as revenue/ sent email and improving the email marketing KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Category Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Create the Brand & Strategy for: Grey Matter HUB (market sizing, brand positioning, targeted audience, marketing strategy, sales strategy, campaigns, sales and sales offers).
•	Coordinate and manage the entire activity of the company
•	Define the business development plans such as: five-year growth plan, client acquisition programs, client loyalty and recovery programs. 
•	Drive profit in the 1st year of activity
•	In charge with the brand’s Social Media channels: strategy, editorial plan, visual and copy content creation, media budget and real-time results optimisations.
•	Responsible with the Google Ads strategy, implementation and content creation
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop, evaluate and adapt the business strategy 
•	Oversee the right implementation of the business strategy by all departments and ensure a good communication between them
•	Motivate, evaluate and develop the team members
•	 Identify opportunities for company growth and develop on them
•	Develop the company's culture, maintaining a good work environment
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	In charge with Garnier & LÓreal Paris skincare categories in the mass market channel
•	Responsible with annual brand launches and rebranding processes 
•	Identify market opportunities based on weekly market research and external customer data. 
•	Expand the portfolio with new segments (such as micellar water products, tissue masks)
•	Create annual promotional plan
•	Correlate stock with the annual communication strategy
•	Drive sales growth for Garnier products on a crowded market 
•	Achieve +30% market share increase for Garnier 
•	 Owner of the category’s marketing budget
•	Define the media plans and optimize budget vs media exposure
•	In charge with ATL and BTL for the skincare brands
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Create and implement the marketing strategy for 4 brands: Bucegi, Bucegi Junior, Sadu and Greuceanu
•	In charge with ATL and BTL actions for all of the above
•	Coordinate the rebranding campaign: “Bucegi, gustul bun se recunoaste”. A campaign that had Pavel Bartos at the centre and that boosted Bucegi’s image by 30% in consumer consideration and trial. 
•	Create a new segment for canned meat products for children and take active part in the launch of Bucegi Junior working closely with Disney. 
•	Project manager in charge with launching over 10 new products/flavours 
•	Active part in the yearly media pitch for all the Scandia Food brands (brief, selecting the agencies, debriefing sessions, comparing the offers, recommending the most efficient proposal and selecting the agency)
•	Media planner for Bucegi, Bucegi Junior and Sadu
•	Weekly reports with media achievements vs the media plan for all involved stations, TRP/GRP and budget wise 
•	 In charge with “Pate Bucegi” Facebook page 
•	Project Manager for Bucegi’s first national promotion:” Strange semne de recunostinta si implineste o dorinta”.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager Bucegi & Sadu

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked hand in hand with the Brand Manager, focused in obtaining the best results in the shortest period of time
•	At the helm of BTL and TM activities for the brand Tuborg, meaning: planning the yearly budget, covering as many cities and exclusive clients as possible, creating instore promotions and materials.
•	Liable for the Tuborg DM Campaign, which holds over 35% of the brands sales volumes: restructured the frequency, worked hand in hand with MOLs sales team and created new and attractive deals.
•	Active part in national campaigns and local large events like Metallica, Rammstein, Greenfest, Tuborg Party Manager national campaign
•	 Fully responsible with the online communication of the brand on social media and on the music platform Tuborgsound.ro
profile_positions.title: Junior Brand Manager

•	 Organising conferences within the country and abroad

•	Directly involved in all board reports, marketing plans and activity plans
•	Organizing internal campaigns for all brands
